alert.text: Language has been changed to English

password.title: Update Password
password.para: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
password.role: This field displays your current role and cannot be changed.

profile.name: Name
profile.title: Profile Information
profile.text2: Click here to re-send the verification email.
profile.text3: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
profile.toast1: This field displays your current role and cannot be changed.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.para: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete.ask: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.desc: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

post.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
